author: Amanda Golden
title: Klobuchar and Abrams team up to promote vote-by-mail, other expansions
description: Amy Klobuchar and Stacey Abrams have teamed up in a new video to promote vote-by-mail and other expansions.
content:
Sen. Amy Klobuchar, D-Minn., and former Georgia Democratic gubernatorial nominee Stacey Abrams are teaming up in a new video promoting efforts to expand voting-by-mail and early voting ahead of the November general election.
